name: Charles Swindoll
quoteTitle: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.
quotes: We are all faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as impossible situations.
Each day of our lives we make deposits in the memory banks of our children.
The remarkable thing is, we have a choice everyday regarding the attitude we will embrace for that day.
When you have vision it affects your attitude. Your attitude is optimistic rather than pessimistic.
When I think of vision, I have in mind the ability to see above and beyond the majority

name: Wayne Gretzky
quoteTitle: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes: Hockey is a unique sport in the sense that you need each and every guy helping each other and pulling in the same direction to be successful.
Most people marry their mother. I married my father.
I wasn't naturally gifted in terms of size and speed; everything I did in hockey I worked for, and that's the way I'll be as a coach.
I get a feeling about where a teammate is going to be. A lot of times, I can turn and pass without even looking.

name: Henry David Thoreau
quoteTitle: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagened.
quotes: It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see.
What is called genius is the abundance of life and health.
I say, beware of all enterprises that require new clothes, and not rather a new wearer of clothes.
There are a thousand hacking at the branches of evil to one who is striking at the root.
Goodness is the only investment that never fails.

name: George Carlin
quoteTitle: Most people work just hard enough not to get fired and get paid just enough money not to quit.
quotes: Don't sweat the petty things and don't pet the sweaty things.
The other night I ate at a real nice family restaurant. Every table had an argument going.
If you can't beat them, arrange to have them beaten.
Dusting is a good example of the futility of trying to put things right. As soon as you dust, the fact of your next dusting has already been established.

name: Dalai Lama
quoteTitle: The roots of all goodness lie in the soil of appreciation for goodness.
quotes: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.
I find hope in the darkest of days, and focus in the brightest. I do not judge the universe.
All major religious traditions carry basically the same message, that is love, compassion and forgiveness the important thing is they should be part of our daily lives.
